login.desktopSubtitle: Scan the QR code to login.

login-partial.desktopTitle: Scan this QR with your phone to login.
login-partial.desktopSubtitle: Scan the QR code to login.

register.desktopSubtitle: Skip the password by scanning this QR with your phone’s camera or an app.

register-partial.desktopTitle: Scan this QR with your phone instead of using a password.

link.desktopTitle: Scan this QR with your phone to enable skip the password.
link.desktopSubtitle: Use your phone’s camera or an app to scan the QR.
link.complete: You have skip the password enabled by OwnID.

recover.desktopSubtitle: Skip the password by scanning the QR with your phone’s camera or an app.

recover-partial.desktopTitle: Scan this QR with your phone to login.

verification.title: Verification Code
verification.message: Does the code on your device match this one?

errors.qr: You must scan QR code before you proceed
errors.link: You must click OwnID button before you proceed

inline.passwordWarn: Enter your password to confirm your account.
inline.noAccount: Account doesn’t exist, create an account to continue.
inline.info:
Access your account without a password.
An encrypted key will be created on your phone and automatically log you in from now on.

common.noteText: The next time you login, we will recognize your phone and instantly log you in.

magicLink.title: Login with magic link
magicLink.message: We will send you a link to automatically log you in.

magicLinkDone.title: Check your email
magicLinkDone.message: We sent you a link to {email} that will automatically log you in.
